param.name: max_nonzero
param.desc: max non zero elements in a row of the input matrix

param.name: mtx_len
param.desc: number of non zero elements in the matrix

param.name: vals_plm_size
param.desc: size of values PLM to be used

param.name: vect_fits_plm
param.desc: 'True' is the vector size fits the vector PLM
